BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to health insurance coverage for surviving family members of certain deceased employees of the department of sanitation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Health insurance coverage for surviving family members of certain deceased employees of the dept of sanitation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring successor employers in the grocery industry to retain eligible employees for a transitional employment period.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring successor employers in the grocery industry to retain eligible employees for a transitional employment period.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring successor employers in the grocery industry to retain eligible employees for a transitional employment period.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring successor employers in the grocery industry to retain eligible employees for a transitional employment period.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring successor employers in the grocery industry to retain eligible employees for a transitional employment period.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring successor employers in the grocery industry to retain eligible employees for a transitional employment period.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to health insurance coverage for surviving family members of certain deceased employees of the department of sanitation
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Health insurance coverage for surviving family members of certain deceased employees of the dept of sanitation.
